sourcesContent:
export const modalStyles = {
    content: {
      margin: 'auto',
      borderRadius: "25px",
      width: "40em",
      height: '18em',
      overflow: 'auto',
    },
    overlay: {
      position: "fixed",
  display: "flex",
  justifyContent: "center",
  top: "0",
  left: "0",
  width: "100%",
  height: "100%",
  backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0, .8)",
  zIndex: "1000",
  overflowY: "auto"
    },
  }
